about.description: Lightweight coordinate-only trajectory reader based on code from GROMACS, MDAnalysis, VMD.
about.summary: Lightweight coordinate-only trajectory reader based on code from GROMACS, MDAnalysis, VMD.

name: simpletraj
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "simpletraj" %}
{% set version = "0.5" %}
{% set sha256 = "860ccba82e7a6085ef1cbff74eb2db53df65fd58edabae3c45b8c45a219b8a3b" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: {{ sha256 }}

build:
  number: 1002
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . --no-deps --ignore-installed --no-cache-dir -vvv"
  skip: True  # [win]

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ compiler('c') }}
  host:
    - python
    - pip
    - numpy
  run:
    - python
    - pip
    - {{ pin_compatible('numpy') }}

test:
  imports:
    - simpletraj
  commands:
    - pip check

about:
  home: https://github.com/arose/simpletraj
  license: GPL-2.0
  license_family: GPL
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: 'Lightweight coordinate-only trajectory reader based on code from GROMACS, MDAnalysis, VMD.'
  description: |
    Lightweight coordinate-only trajectory reader based on code from GROMACS, MDAnalysis, VMD.
  doc_url: https://github.com/arose/simpletraj
  dev_url: https://github.com/arose/simpletraj

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - jan-janssen
    - synapticarbors
smithy_version:
No azure token. Create a token and
put it in ~/.conda-smithy/azure.token
3.6.15
